data.author: EBlaze

descriptions.app_description: A different astronomy and space science related image is featured each day, along with a brief explanation.

key_features: Automate the dissemination of NASA's APOD to keep users informed and inspired.
Enhance user engagement by providing daily educational and visually appealing content.

settings.label: interval
settings.description: The interval at which the integration will run. The format is a cron expression.

settings.label: API Key
settings.description: The API key for the NASA APOD API.

settings.label: Target Output
settings.description: Select the output you would like to send to the target.

settings.label: Slack Channel
settings.description: The Slack channel to which the integration will post the APOD.

settings.label: Twitter Handle
settings.description: The Twitter handle to which the integration will post the APOD.
